title: PROJECT Fiora
body: Riot please this must be done. It makes sense actually since many champions share a theme.{{champion:114}}

replies.body: Except, I think she's supposed to wield a toothpick.

I already suggested this, but mine didn't receive any attention and this is so I don't care, lol, anyways I'd buy this in a heartbeat, but between Violinist Fiora and PROJECT: Fiora, I don't know which the majority would like more.
I would absolutely instabuy a PROJECT skin for Fiora
